body.name: Mini Washing Machine Portable Washer College Rooms Travel Home Apartment Laundry Small Turbine Washer with USB Business Trip Sink RV Trailer Truck Dormitory Dorm Bucket(watts, 80)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 48 mins
features: 【High Quality and Durable Material】- The portable mini washing machine is made of ABS material. Turbo forward and reverse cleaning, and low noise design, don't worry about disturbing your rest or sleep!

【Water Saving Cleaning】- The portable mini washing machine is a combination of environmental protection, water and electricity saving, and it uses high-frequency vibration cavitation to accelerate the dispersion of liquids and stains, while the upgraded fan blades enhance the vibration cleaning effect.
【USB Power Saving】- Compact washing machines are powered by USB cable, reducing energy consumption. Any bucket, washbasin, hand-washing station can use it to wash clothes. srdmuph

【Easy to Use and Carry】 - You just need to fix the washer on the edge of the bucket, then add clothes, water and detergent to the bucket, switch on the power to start washing, the whole process lasts for 30 minutes, and it will automatically shut down, you need to restart the mini washer within one minute, then you can continue to use it.

【Versatile Portable Washing Machine】- The portable washing machine is designed with convenience and comfort in mind. Not only does it not take up space, but you can always carry it in your handbag or suitcase. The portable washer is perfect for tight spaces in your home, dorm room, RV and travel or mobile home. It can also be used for newborn clothing, underwear, towels, rags, pasted clothing, socks and other small lightweight clothing. Do not use on jeans, coats and other heavy clothing.
body.description: ◆Wattage: 80 watts/30 watts◆This portable mini washing machine is an independent washing machine chassis, which can be directly hung on the wall of the bucket and placed at the bottom of the bucket!◆Can be used for newborn clothing, underwear, towels, rags, pasted clothing, socks and other small lightweight clothing.【Easy to Use】1.Fix the washer on the edge of the bucket,washbasin, or hand-washing station.2.Add clothes, water and detergent to the bucket.3.Switch on the power to start washing, the whole process lasts for 30 minutes.4.It will automatically shut down after 30 minutes, you need to restart the mini washer after one minute, then you can continue to use it.◆Size: 9.5*9.5*5.5cm◆Power supply:USBNote:1.Please install the suction cup at the bottom of the wash basin or bucket, not on the curved wall.2.This equipment is not suitable for washing large and heavy clothes such as jeans!3.Depending on the production version, the appearance of the actual product may be slightly different from the picture, please refer to the actual product.4.The selected wattage is the maximum value, if you want to achieve the maximum wattage during use, you need to use it with a fast charging source adapter. The rated wattage is lower than the maximum wattage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They bank on the cost of returns. It floats on top of the water and the two tiny suction cups are not strong enough to keep it in the water. Wasted money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought it cuz I don't want my husband to wash the socks and underwears together even though I know they will be pasteurized with high temperature. And also I think it's very convenient to take to travel if you don't want to wash something by hand. And the product is very easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: Waste of money it cannot do a thing it spins to mix water and create suds and that’s just about it. It does not have enough power to wash clothes as small as underwear or baby clothing it stops working when clothing comes into contact while spinning in the water, very ineffective machine. Don’t waste your time or money. Had it returned. Going to get a bigger one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 2 failed in 6 weeks
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The first one failed a little over 2 weeks or use, gave them a chance and asked for a replacement. Second one failed 4 weeks after... out of return window. Likely due to poor quality gears, the reverse spin damage it every time it engages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work as expected
reviews.reviewText: Maybe for a pair of underwear or a sock. Something polyester…cotton or anything more than that it stops moving water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: Worked for about an hour before failing.Worked great with socks and underwear, not so for Tshirts and gym trunks.Requested refund.
